messages.title: Demand Better Than A Tory Brexit
messages.content: Tory Cabinet papers reveal no-deal Brexit will result in higher prices and shortages of fuel, food and medicine ... and rising costs in social care, whilst Johnson says “I’d rather be dead in a ditch” than delay Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: People's Vote and an Exit from Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are the largest, strongest Remain party. We want a People’s Vote and an Exit from Brexit.
You've elected 37 Liberal Democrat councillors to run your local services and 3 MEPs to represent you in the European Parliament.
Demand Better for the environment, for education, for your community... for your Government.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Liberal Democrats can stop the Conservatives and Brexit Party here.

issues.brexitEurope:
Tory Cabinet papers reveal no-deal Brexit will result in higher prices and shortages of fuel, food and medicine ... and rising costs in social care.
 
We want a People’s Vote and an Exit from Brexit.

I'm passionate about getting an Exit from Brexit and have campaigned for a People’s Vote, but locally we need more.
issues.education: We need to make sure that every person has the opportunity to follow their aspirations by having a fairly funded education system.
issues.environment: We need deliverable action on climate change.

community.content: As residents of Newbury constituency, we demand better from our government on the issues we face locally and nationally. I'm proud to put myself forward to continue to represent my community and make the changes needed to benefit everyone.

leaflet.personalStatement: I’ve lived in Thatcham all my life and have been active in the Newbury and Thatcham community since I was 15 years old. My wife and I both work locally, and our children go to local schools.

contactInformation.address: Suite 6, Thatcham House, Turners Drive, Thatcham RG19 4QD
